notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: Caitlin Gilsenan-Reed performed data extraction, data analysis and research, and also drafted the paper. Neil Langlois designed the project, obtained ethical approvals, supervised the project, assisted with development, provided intellectual input into analysis and assisted with drafting the paper. Geoff Higgins provided the concept, assisted with interpretation, provided expert input and assisted in drafting the paper.
